meta.name: description
meta.content: Uwharrie Charter Academy will graduate students who understand the importance of critical thinking, problem solving, responsible citizenship, and clear communication so that they are prepared for the world of work and/or higher education.

div.marquee: UCA will be closed until May15th as a precautionary measure to protect our students and staff...............Please check out the resources provided on this helpful link from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/community/index.html

div.div: Location: Uwharrie Charter Academy - High, 5326 U.S. 220 Business South, Asheboro, NC 27205, USA

article.aria-label: UCA Lottery on Facebook Live April 4th

h3.a: UCA Lottery on Facebook Live April 4th

div.div: UCA has received permission from the Office of Charter Schools to hold our lottery drawing on April 4th at 12:00 p.m. on Facebook Live. Registration will be open until that date. This will only be held over Facebook Live due to the Governor's COVID-19 restrictions.
Please click on the headline for more information.

article.aria-label: Option for Students who need Breakfast or Lunch

h3.a: Option for Students who need Breakfast or Lunch

div.div:
Below is an option for any student who needs access to food during our school closure. Times are 8:15-9:00 a.m. and 11:00-12:30 p.m. at Trinity Elementary, Ramseur Elementary, Randleman Elementary, and Southmont Elementary.
If transportation is an issue please contact Kim Reddick at www.run5feed5@gmail.com for more information.
